Posts.Content: CruzinSuzin wrote: I recently lost my father, Dec. 27th 09, to metastatic liver cancer.  He was still golfing last summer and now he's gone.  That is how fast it took him down.  Immediately following his funeral, we(my brother my sister and myself) were informed from our mother that her breast cancer was back and had metastasised(sp) to her bones. With no history of cancer in our family, to say it's "surreal" is far from accurate to describe what I feel at this point.  We are 3 VERY concerned sibs that are offered NO support for any kind of testing from our current doctors.  Can anyone Please tell me what options we have to find out if we are also going to be sick?   Or preventative medicine we can seek?  thanks in advance~ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Terrified by NOT knowing! CruzinSuzin msphil
